participant_1.background:
I have a black belt in karate.
I vacation along lake michigan every summer.
I love to eat shrimp and lobster.
My favorite drink is iced coffee.
I am in a jazz band and play the saxophone.

participant_2.background:
I like to remodel homes.
I like to shoot a bow.
I like to go shopping with my daughters.
My favorite holiday is halloween.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! How are you?
I'm doing great! What do you do for fun?
I like to play sports, listen to music, and travel. What about you?
I like to remodel homes, go shopping, and shoot a bow.
That's cool! I've never been remodeling a home before. How do you like it?
It's really fun! I like being able to see the transformation of a space from start to finish.
I can imagine! I love that feeling of accomplishment. What's your favorite thing to remodel?
I like to remodel kitchens and bathrooms. They're the most challenging, but also the most rewarding.
I can see why! They're both such important spaces in a home.
Exactly! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I listen to all kinds of music, but I mostly listen to jazz.
Oh, that's cool! I've never really gotten into jazz. What do you like about it?
I like the improvisation and the way it can make me feel. It's just so relaxing.
I can see how that would be relaxing. I'll have to give it a try sometime.
I'm glad! What's your favorite holiday?
Halloween is my favorite holiday! I love the costumes, the candy, and the spooky atmosphere.
Halloween is my favorite holiday too! I love getting to dress up and go trick-or-treating.
Me too! It's the best.
So, what do you like to do for Halloween?
I like to go to haunted houses, watch horror movies, and eat candy.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do all those things too.
Great! We should have a Halloween party together sometime.
That would be so much fun
